data.description:
View broadcasts through the PROSENSE is a new level of immersion to the game for true fans - a VIP area with the best views in VR and the original UI.
PROSENSE has already aired such major Sports as the All Stars Week of the Continental Hockey League , Fights ACB etc. 
We are constantly expanding the themes of the broadcasts and a list of additional materials - interview, backstage shots.
With PROSENSE - you will move immediately to an event that you are interested in, wherever it took place - just be where you want to be! 

Contact us through facebook (https://www.facebook.com/prosense.tv ) 
or email hello@prosense.tv

changelog.change_log: Watch ACB 50 - STORMBRINGER live srteaming from Sibur Arena, St. Petersburg at Dec 18, 2016 6:00 pm in our app
Watch ACB 50 - STORMBRINGER live srteaming from Sibur Arena, St. Petersburg at Dec 18, 2016 6:00 pm in our app
Watch ACB 50 - STORMBRINGER live srteaming from Sibur Arena, St. Petersburg at Dec 18, 2016 6:00 pm in our app

Good day!
We have substantially improved our app, and now it better matches the Oculus Store level.
Among the improvements:
- technically - improved stability, speed in image processing, now should not be "locked up"
- visual - images have become more quality
- added sound.

This week, from Friday to Sunday, we will provide a stereoscopic 180 streaming of the "St. Petersburg Open 2016" (international tennis tournament) and our main partnetr is a russian branch of Samsung.
So we are absolutely in need of this application to be available with a full access!

We did all our best to improve the app, approve us in the Oculus store with full access, please!
